name: 4 Seasons to be Reborn
description:
The Bad? 

- You died trying to save a cat...(meow)

The Good?

- Mother earth gave you a special chance to be REBORN!

To do so. you accepted Mother's Earth petition :

"I am sick, please help me change seasons... From Spring to Summer, from Summer to Fall and from Fall to Winter."

CONTROLS:

-Use your mouse click to move your player and shoot trees!

-
